name: Robert M. FOURNIER v. LINDY CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION
name_abbreviation: Fournier v. Lindy Construction & Development Corp.

parties: Robert M. FOURNIER v. LINDY CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The plaintiff’s motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is assigned to the motion calendar for Wednesday, May 7, 1980 at 9:30 a. m. for oral argument.

attorneys: Selya & Iannuccillo, Richard L. Patz, Providence, for plaintiff.
casebody.head_matter:
Robert M. FOURNIER v. LINDY CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION.
No. 79-458-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
May 2, 1980.
Selya & Iannuccillo, Richard L. Patz, Providence, for plaintiff.
Abraham Belilove, Providence, for defendant.
